secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun and starts with the letter 'Y'.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Yogurt" and "Yam".

No, you cannot bring "Yöghurt".

The rule is that the item must be a single-word noun starting with the letter "Y".
